version_description:
- It became to be able to choose vibration to alarm sound. 
- Sleep data became to be able to post to Evernote. 
- Fixes issue that the volume can't change.
- App design fine-correction (iOS 7 and later).
- Other, minor improvements.

- Added the Passcode Lock.
- Cooperation with LINE app.
- Fixed a issue that can not be performed automatic tweet.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, minor improvements.

- iPhone6, IPhone6 Plus Retina HD support.
- Added the data export function of between the free version and paid version. (iOS 8.0 and later)
- App became able to send the past data to Health app.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, minor improvements.

※ If you want to send the past data to Health app, please perform it from 'Unsent data Uploading' in app settings.

※ If the app was crashed when measurement start or show the settings, please restart the app after crash it.

- iOS 9 support.
- Added function to back up your database to Dropbox and restore data.
- Added new alarm based on target sleep duration.
- Added new display formats for sleep charts.
- Increased sensor sensitivity to a nine-step.
- Reduced memory usage.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, some improvements.

- iOS 9 support.
- Added function to back up your database to Dropbox and restore data.
- Added new alarm based on target sleep duration.
- Added new display formats for sleep charts.
- Increased sensor sensitivity to a nine-step.
- Reduced memory usage.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, some improvements.

- It will be able to sound the music and vibration at the same time.
- In the alarm sound selection, it will be able to add more than one song at a time.
- It will be able to disable the proximity sensor.
- Added the fingerprint authentication to passcode lock.
- In the list, corrected the deviation of the day of the week.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, some improvements.

- Optimized for iOS 10.
- 3D Touch support.
- Bug fixes.
- Other, minor improvements.
